properties.name: userPromptVariable
properties.label: User Prompt Variable
properties.description: Name of the workflow variable containing the user prompt (without # symbols, e.g., 'userprompt', 'question', 'request')

properties.name: additionalContext
properties.label: Additional Context Variables
properties.description: Comma-separated list of additional workflow variables to include (e.g., 'customerName,orderAmount,productType')

properties.name: customPromptTemplate
properties.label: Custom Prompt Template
properties.description: Custom template for the AI prompt. Use #{variable.name} to reference workflow variables. If empty, will use the userPromptVariable directly.

properties.name: systemInstruction
properties.label: System Instruction
properties.value: You are a helpful and concise AI assistant.
properties.description: Instructions that guide the AI's behavior and expertise domain

properties.name: outputVariable
properties.label: Output Variable Name
properties.description: Name of workflow variable to store the AI response (e.g., 'aiResponse', 'analysis', 'recommendation')
